prod_short_desc: Build your own holiday season fun with Santa and his sleigh!
prod_long_desc:
Bring some LEGO® DUPLO® holiday magic to your toddler, as they fly Santa around in his sleigh. Young children will love landing the sleigh to meet the 2 child DUPLO figures for some festive fun down the sledging slope. Help build the slope, the fir tree and snowman to develop early construction skills. Includes 3 DUPLO figures plus 2 animal figures.
Includes 3 LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Santa and 2 children, plus 2 animal figures: a reindeer and a squirrel.
Features Santa’s sleigh with reindeer harness, slope for sledging with opening hatch to hide gifts inside, fir tree, and a snowman.
Includes bricks decorated as a candy cane, gifts, star and a snowman face as story starters.
Accessory elements include a sledge and Santa's hat.
Use the characters, accessories and play starters in this set to help your child get into the spirit ofthe festive season.
Toddlers will love driving Santa’s sleigh with the reindeer figure and pushing the sledge down the slope again and again.
Encourage early building skills while creating a winter scene with the buildable slope, snowman and fir tree.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be safe and suitable for small hands.
Santa's sleigh with reindeer measures over 4” high, 9” long and 2” wide.
Slope measures over 2” high, 7” wide and3” long.
Tree measures over 6” high, 5” wide and 3” long.
Snowman measures over 3” high, 2” wide and 1” long.
There are several My Town products to collect and play out family fun in a recognizable LEGO® DUPLO® world.
